aquariumFishFeed.name: Clean & Clear Water
aquariumFishFeed.description: Specially formulated feed to promote clean and clear water in aquariums.
aquariumFishFeed.usage: Feed small amounts multiple times a day, adjusting the quantity based on the number and size of fish.

aquariumFishFeed.name: Protein Enriched
aquariumFishFeed.description: High protein content for optimal growth and development of aquarium fish.
aquariumFishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, shrimp meal, wheat flour, vitamins, minerals
aquariumFishFeed.usage: Feed twice daily, an amount that fish can consume within a few minutes.

aquariumFishFeed.name: Full Amino Profile
aquariumFishFeed.description: Complete amino acid profile to support fish health and vitality.
aquariumFishFeed.ingredients: Fishmeal, soy protein, krill meal, vitamins, minerals
aquariumFishFeed.usage: Feed small portions multiple times a day to prevent overeating and maintain water quality.

aquariumFishFeed.name: Improves Fish Color
aquariumFishFeed.description: Enhances fish coloration for vibrant and attractive aquarium display.
aquariumFishFeed.usage: Feed once or twice a day, an amount that fish can consume in a few minutes.
